Hero.title: Your health assistant
Hero.subtitle: This AI-powered medical assistant was created to provide much-needed assistance to Venezuelans who are struggling to access medical care during this turbulent time.

About.why_title: A Vital Resource in Moments of Crisis
About.what_content: José Gregorio is an AI-powered medical assistant designed to help Venezuelans access medical assistance promptly and efficiently. Named in honor of the beloved Venezuelan doctor José Gregorio Hernández, who is revered for his dedication to the sick and needy, this AI embodies the same spirit of service.
About.how_content: In an interactive chat view, you can input your symptoms, medical history, or health concerns. The AI then processes your input and provides you with a detailed, understandable response. This might include potential diagnoses, recommended next steps, or advice on when to seek immediate medical attention.
About.why_content: Venezuela is currently experiencing a humanitarian crisis, and the healthcare system is in a state of collapse. Hospitals are understaffed and underfunded, and many Venezuelans are unable to access the medical care they need. This AI is designed to provide much-needed assistance to Venezuelans who are struggling to access medical care during this turbulent time.

Features.f1_content: Unlike other AI assistants on the market, AI José Gregorio is available in Venezuela.
Features.f2_content: AI José Gregorio provides you with a response in a matter of seconds.
Features.f3_content: It is almost as easy as chatting with a friend.

FAQs.faqs_subtitle: You probably have some questions about AI José Gregorio. Here are some answers.
FAQs.q1: Is AI José Gregorio a substitute for medical attention?
FAQs.a1: No. AI José Gregorio is not a substitute for medical attention. AI José Gregorio is a tool that can help you make informed decisions about your health. You should always consult a qualified doctor for a diagnosis and treatment specific to your person.
FAQs.q2: Does AI José Gregorio save my information?
FAQs.a2: No. At the moment, AI José Gregorio does not save any personal information. All the information you enter in AI José Gregorio is processed in real time and is discarded once you are given an answer.
FAQs.q3: Is AI José Gregorio available in other languages?
FAQs.a3: No. AI José Gregorio is only available in Spanish at the moment.
FAQs.q4: Is the information provided by AI José Gregorio reliable?
FAQs.a4: AI José Gregorio is designed to provide you with accurate and reliable information. However, we cannot guarantee that the information provided by AI José Gregorio is 100% accurate because it is randomly generated from data patterns which can generate inaccurate responses or hallucinations.
FAQs.q5: How can I help AI José Gregorio improve?
FAQs.a5: At the moment, by providing feedback on the application and sharing AI José Gregorio with your friends and family to make the project more recognized and obtain some kind of financing
FAQs.q6: How can I contact the AI José Gregorio team?
